name: Goblant Vault
description:
Goblant Vault

The local townspeople have been complaining that their smaller livestock have been disappearing at night, despite being locked up in their pens.

Rumors abound that there is activity stemming from the abandoned temple that is about a half day's journey into the foothills to the North.
